title: All-American Girl
description: TOP TEN REASONS why Samantha Madison feels like her life might just be over:10. Her big sister is the most popular girl in school9. Her little sister is a certified genius8. She's in love with her big sister's boyfriend7. She got caught selling celebrity portraits in school6. And now she's being forced to take art classes5. She's just saved the President of the United States from an assassination attempt4. So the whole world thinks she is a hero3. Even though Sam knows she is far, far from being a hero2. And now she's been appointed teen ambassador to the UN And the #1 reason Sam's life is utterly and completely over?1.The President's son just might be in love with her.
author: Meg Cabot
